${ModID}:AirCurrent.NAME: Air Current
${ModID}:AirCurrent.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the target has ${ModID}:Petra, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:GeothermalHeating.NAME: Geothermal Heating
${ModID}:GeothermalHeating.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. +!M! Block per distinct debuff on the target.

${ModID}:MudFissure.NAME: Mud Fissure
${ModID}:MudFissure.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Double damage if the target has debuffs.

${ModID}:Enervate.NAME: Enervate
${ModID}:Enervate.DESCRIPTION: Target loses half of its Strength, then loses !M! more. Exhaust.

${ModID}:Excavation.NAME: Excavation
${ModID}:Excavation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Fetch !M! cards from your discard pile and Retain them.

${ModID}:Geomorphology.NAME: Geomorphology
${ModID}:Geomorphology.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Retain or Exhaust a card, apply !M! ${ModID}:Petra to a random enemy.

${ModID}:TectonicQuake.NAME: Tectonic Quake
${ModID}:TectonicQuake.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! ${ModID}:Petra and Weak to all enemies. Exhaust.
${ModID}:TectonicQuake.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! ${ModID}:Petra and Weak to all enemies.

${ModID}:DustTornado.NAME: Dust Tornado
${ModID}:DustTornado.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in hand to play !M! random cards from your discard pile. Exhaust.
